name: The Grove Squad
description:
The forest is burning. The grove squad is sent on a mission to defend against the fire invasion.

The team progress through a map and its challenges or fights with the help of a smart use of their different skills. Take care, losing a character means the end of the journey.

The Grove Squad is a puzzle/RTS game where three little beings make a suicide squad to stop a forest fire. It's only by combining their efforts that they'll be able to make it.

  • Gameplay - The characters deal with obstacles of the map and fights. Exploration is key.
  • Genre - RTS micromanagement oriented.

Controls:

  • Camera movements : move the mouse to pan and middle click to rotate the camera.
  • Skills : keyboard (keep the key pressed and click to cast a skill)
  • Character selection: mouse or keyboard: 1,2,3 and 4 to select your characters (press once to select, twice to focus the camera on the character)
